ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Provides a parallel version of the L-BFGS-B method of optim(). The main function of the package is optimParallel(), which has the same usage and output as optim(). Using optimParallel() can significantly reduce the optimization time.

Provides a parallel version of the L-BFGS-B method of optim(). The main function of the package is optimParallel(), which has the same usage and output as optim(). Using optimParallel() can significantly reduce the optimization time.

name: r-optimparallel
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.0-2' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-optimparallel
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/optimParallel_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/optimParallel/optimParallel_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 0f9bc62c23d9005130f2892bf5eaecf308fa48a727bdd5e19b7dcd1d95f30a9d

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('optimParallel')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('optimParallel')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/florafauna/optimParallel-R
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Provides a parallel version of the L-BFGS-B method of optim(). The main function of
    the package is optimParallel(), which has the same usage and output as optim().
    Using optimParallel() can significantly reduce the optimization time.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
